original_title: Sleepy Hollow: Cast and Creators Live at PALEYFEST
overview: "Sleepy Hollow" at PALEYFEST on March 19, 2014.The Headless Horseman rides again! And he's even deadlier than anyone -- Washington Irving included -- ever imagined. This modern spin on Irving's classic tale has great fun with its "fish-out-of-water" premise, taking Ichabod Crane (Tom Mison) out of the Colonial era and time-tripping him into present-day New York State.
title: Sleepy Hollow: Cast and Creators Live at PALEYFEST
